title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Minimal delays for US airlines after Airbus orders global emergency software fix on A320-family jets
items.description: Airbus ordered airlines to perform an immediate software fix on more than 6,000 A320-family jets around the world, including hundreds in the U.S.

items.title: Updated: All the best Black Friday flight deals (so far)
items.description: Act fast to save hundreds on airfare with these Black Friday, Cyber Monday and Travel Tuesday flight deals for 2025.

items.title: Seats.aero is having a major Black Friday deal on "Pro" membership
items.description: Award booking tool on sale for 30% off the yearly "Pro" subscription

items.title: Save Marriott points by periodically repricing your upcoming award stays
items.description: With Marriott's dynamic award pricing, you may be able to save points on previously booked stays. Here's how to rebook your stays and get back some po...
